product_name: Victorinox Deluxe Concealed Security Neck Pouch
long_description: The Victorinox Deluxe Concealed Security neck pouch carries and organizes your ID, passport and other travel necessities with discreet simplicity. Hanging, cushioned neck piece is lined with soft mesh, which permits wearing on the inside of clothes for security. Main pocket carries tickets, passport, travelers checks and most sizes of currency. 2 smaller zip pockets stash coins or other small essentials.
short_description: The Victorinox Deluxe Concealed Security neck pouch carries and organizes your ID, passport and other travel necessities with discreet simplicity.
